text:
C3LX | Backend Engineer (https://angel.co/c3lx/jobs/114267-backend-software-engineer) | Denver, Colorado | ONSITE | Full-time

C3LX is a small team of experienced, passionate individuals dedicated to improving disease management and positively impacting healthcare. Our Nuyu platform engages patients in their daily lives and facilitates real-time interventions, which improves outcomes.

As one of our first software engineers, you will be instrumental in making Nuyu a joyous and impactful application. Within any given sprint youâ€™ll be involved in developing and implementing backend components to support our mobile and web applications. This might include tasks such as database design, endpoint planning, infrastructure management, and algorithm optimization. Our applications are powered by JavaScript (node, express, react, redux). JS experience is a plus, but we care more about your ability to learn quickly and understand new concepts.

Apply on AngelList (https://angel.co/c3lx/jobs/114267-backend-software-engineer), send us message on our website (http://www.c3lx.com/contact), or tweet at us @c3lxinc
